posts.post_content:
Yes, another thread of mine begging for cards off my want list lol. Seriously though, as always im looking for T210 and T209-2 cards. All series considered on the T210's with an emphasis on 5, 6, 7 making up my want list. I also have some cards for trade if you prefer in the same designations. I may even have a T206 or two to pull out and offer. Thank you for any help!

Jason

Jason- good luck, I'm in the same boat you are when it comes to finding T210s in series 6,7 and 8. 
It seems like they have really, really dried up lately. I scour eBay and other sources but nada. I did pick up (finally) a Dudley which completed series 1 for me but that card was really a booger, waited 5 years for it.
Best,
tbob
